attributes

Class Code

  • java.lang.Object
    • attributes.Code
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Attribute

    public class Code
extends java.lang.Object
implements Attribute
    A representation of the Code Attribute in Java Class files.
    See Also:
    http://docs.oracle.com/javase/specs/jvms/se5.0/html/ClassFile.doc.html

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Attribute[] attributes
      The actual array of Attributes for this class.
      byte[] attrtable
      An array of bytes corresponding to the Attributes this class has.
      byte[] codetable
      The array of opcodes.
      ConstantPool cp
      The ConstantPool the values will be gotten from.
      byte[] extable
      An array of exceptions that can be thrown, using the code array
      short maxlocals
      The highest amount of variables that will be allocated at once
      short maxstack
      The highest amount of stack a method calling this will use

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Code(byte[] all, ConstantPool cp)
      A constructor that parses all the values from bytes.
      Code(short maxstack, short maxlocals, int codelength, byte[] code, short extablelength, byte[] extable, short attr, byte[] attrs, ConstantPool cp)
      A simple constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] getCodeArray()
      Returns the opcodes used in the code array
      void parseValues(ConstantPool cp)
      Basically the method that gets all the necessary information from the bytes.
      java.lang.String toString()
      toString method that qualifies all tables, and writes the stack and locals.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • maxstack

        public final short maxstack
        The highest amount of stack a method calling this will use

      • maxlocals

        public final short maxlocals
        The highest amount of variables that will be allocated at once

      • codetable

        public final byte[] codetable
        The array of opcodes. Currently needs opcode support

      • extable

        public final byte[] extable
        An array of exceptions that can be thrown, using the code array

      • attrtable

        public final byte[] attrtable
        An array of bytes corresponding to the Attributes this class has. Usually LineNumberTable and LocalVariableTable.

      • attributes

        public Attribute[] attributes
        The actual array of Attributes for this class.

      • cp

        public final ConstantPool cp
        The ConstantPool the values will be gotten from.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Code

        public Code(short maxstack,
    short maxlocals,
    int codelength,
    byte[] code,
    short extablelength,
    byte[] extable,
    short attr,
    byte[] attrs,
    ConstantPool cp)
        A simple constructor.
        Parameters:
        maxstack - Highest stack amount
        maxlocals - Most local variables
        codelength - length of code array
        code - array of opcodes
        extablelength - length of exception table
        extable - exception table
        attr - length of attribute table
        attrs - attribute table
        cp - the ConstantPool

      • Code

        public Code(byte[] all,
    ConstantPool cp)
        A constructor that parses all the values from bytes.
        Parameters:
        all - the entire byte array, converted to values.
        cp - the ConstantPool
